title: Sukki's story
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and sons
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: A young man's lifelong connection to his mother
description: Sukki’s story is an animated digital story created by Thomas Leung. Thomas reflects on his changing relationship with his mother when he leaves Hong Kong to start a new life in a new country.
